## isUrl() function

Simple check to see if the string is potentially a URL.

Only looks for a prefix of https://, http:// &amp; file://

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isUrl(s: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  s | string |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
